name: JAILBREAK
description:
JAILBREAK - is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass levels for the prisoner. In this game you have to help your hero to escape by collecting keys from different doors. At each level there are four keys collecting those opens the door to the chamber that will transfer you to another level. In the game there are various types of traps, so be very attentive and think over every step. Wrong move may lead to the death of the protagonist and accordingly, the level will restart.

KEY FEATURES:

1) A large number of various levels.
2) Beautiful, animated graphics.
3) Hardcore, interesting gameplay.
